title: Study of Schooners and Beacon Day Marker
medium:
Graphite, brush and white gouache on laminated paper
(Top layer is green/ lower layer is off-white wove)
description: A sailing ship and two details of it. Distant view of four ships. At center, the masts of a ship shown behind a projecting shore, and at bottom, four views of sailing ships. A projecting shoreline is also shown.
name: Drawing
